section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: In text rendering, list item children of unordered list SHOULD be rendered as a typographical unordered list. Audio and other rendering formats MAY embellish the children of unordered list to signal that the list items are without inherent order.
Processors SHOULD consider the nesting level of the unordered list component in choosing the indentation level and list item label that is applied to list item children.

section.title: XDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of an unordered list in an XDITA topic.
section.pre:
What we offer

  • "Know-how" license

  • Warranty of exclusive territory

  • Initial training

  • Support through online, email, and telephone channels
